entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning and this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
